thermalexchange.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 when damaged by Fire moves; can't be burned.

thickfat.name: Thick Fat
thickfat.desc: If a Pokemon uses a Fire- or Ice-type attack against this Pokemon, that Pokemon's offensive stat is halved when calculating the damage to this Pokemon.
thickfat.shortDesc: Fire-/Ice-type moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved offensive stat.

tintedlens.name: Tinted Lens
tintedlens.desc: This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.
tintedlens.shortDesc: This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its maximum HP, rounded down, its offensive stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Water-type attack.
torrent.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's offensive stat is 1.5x with Water attacks.

toughclaws.name: Tough Claws
toughclaws.desc: This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.
toughclaws.shortDesc: This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.

toxicboost.name: Toxic Boost
toxicboost.desc: While this Pokemon is poisoned, the power of its physical attacks is multiplied by 1.5.
toxicboost.shortDesc: While this Pokemon is poisoned, its physical attacks have 1.5x power.

toxicchain.name: Toxic Chain
toxicchain.desc: This Pokemon's moves have a 30% chance of badly poisoning. This effect comes after a move's inherent secondary effect chance.
toxicchain.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves have a 30% chance of badly poisoning.

toxicdebris.name: Toxic Debris
toxicdebris.desc: If this Pokemon is hit by a physical attack, Toxic Spikes are set on the opposing side.
toxicdebris.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is hit by a physical attack, Toxic Spikes are set on the opposing side.

trace.name: Trace
trace.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon copies a random opposing Pokemon's Ability. Abilities that cannot be copied are As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Zen Mode, and Zero to Hero. If no opposing Pokemon has an Ability that can be copied, this Ability will activate as soon as one does.
trace.shortDesc: On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.

transistor.name: Transistor
transistor.desc: This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.3 while using an Electric-type attack.
transistor.shortDesc: This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.3 while using an Electric-type attack.

triage.name: Triage
triage.desc: This Pokemon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.
triage.shortDesc: This Pokemon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

truant.name: Truant
truant.desc: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.
truant.shortDesc: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.desc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore certain Abilities of other Pokemon. The Abilities that can be negated are Aroma Veil, Aura Break, Battle Armor, Big Pecks, Bulletproof, Clear Body, Contrary, Damp, Dazzling, Disguise, Dry Skin, Filter, Flash Fire, Flower Gift, Flower Veil, Fluffy, Friend Guard, Fur Coat, Grass Pelt, Heatproof, Heavy Metal, Hyper Cutter, Ice Face, Ice Scales, Immunity, Inner Focus, Insomnia, Keen Eye, Leaf Guard, Levitate, Light Metal, Lightning Rod, Limber, Magic Bounce, Magma Armor, Marvel Scale, Mirror Armor, Motor Drive, Multiscale, Oblivious, Overcoat, Own Tempo, Pastel Veil, Punk Rock, Queenly Majesty, Sand Veil, Sap Sipper, Shell Armor, Shield Dust, Simple, Snow Cloak, Solid Rock, Soundproof, Sticky Hold, Storm Drain, Sturdy, Suction Cups, Sweet Veil, Tangled Feet, Telepathy, Thick Fat, Unaware, Vital Spirit, Volt Absorb, Water Absorb, Water Bubble, Water Veil, White Smoke, Wonder Guard, and Wonder Skin. This affects every other Pokemon on the field, whether or not it is a target of this Pokemon's move, and whether or not their Ability is beneficial to this Pokemon.
turboblaze.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.desc: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's Attack, Special Attack, and accuracy stat stages when taking damage, and ignores other Pokemon's Defense, Special Defense, and evasiveness stat stages when dealing damage.
unaware.shortDesc: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's stat stages when taking or doing damage.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.desc: If this Pokemon loses its held item for any reason, its Speed is doubled as long as it remains active, has this Ability, and is not holding an item.
unburden.shortDesc: Speed is doubled on held item loss; boost is lost if it switches, gets new item/Ability.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.desc: While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries. This Ability activates before hazards and other Abilities take effect.
unnerve.shortDesc: While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries.

unseenfist.name: Unseen Fist
unseenfist.desc: This Pokemon's contact moves ignore the target's protection, except Max Guard.
unseenfist.shortDesc: This Pokemon's contact moves ignore the target's protection, except Max Guard.

vesselofruin.name: Vessel of Ruin
vesselofruin.desc: Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Special Attack multiplied by 0.75.
vesselofruin.shortDesc: Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Special Attack multiplied by 0.75.

victorystar.name: Victory Star
victorystar.desc: This Pokemon and its allies' moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.1.
victorystar.shortDesc: This Pokemon and its allies' moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.1.

vitalspirit.name: Vital Spirit
vitalspirit.desc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.
vitalspirit.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

voltabsorb.name: Volt Absorb
voltabsorb.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by an Electric-type move.
voltabsorb.shortDesc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Electric moves; Electric immunity.

wanderingspirit.name: Wandering Spirit
wanderingspirit.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability swapped with this one. Does not affect Pokemon with the As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Hadron Engine, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Orichalcum Pulse, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero Abilities.
wanderingspirit.shortDesc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability swapped with this one.

waterabsorb.name: Water Absorb
waterabsorb.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move.
waterabsorb.shortDesc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.

waterbubble.name: Water Bubble
waterbubble.desc: This Pokemon's offensive stat is doubled while using a Water-type attack. If a Pokemon uses a Fire-type attack against this Pokemon, that Pokemon's offensive stat is halved when calculating the damage to this Pokemon. This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.
waterbubble.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Water power is 2x; it can't be burned; Fire power against it is halved.

watercompaction.name: Water Compaction
watercompaction.desc: This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages after it is damaged by a Water-type move.
watercompaction.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages after it is damaged by a Water-type move.

waterveil.name: Water Veil
waterveil.desc: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.
waterveil.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.

weakarmor.name: Weak Armor
weakarmor.desc: If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, its Defense is lowered by 1 stage and its Speed is raised by 2 stages.
weakarmor.shortDesc: If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, Defense is lowered by 1, Speed is raised by 2.

wellbakedbody.name: Well-Baked Body
wellbakedbody.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Fire-type moves and raises its Defense by 2 stages when hit by a Fire-type move.
wellbakedbody.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages if hit by a Fire move; Fire immunity.

whitesmoke.name: White Smoke
whitesmoke.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.
whitesmoke.shortDesc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

wimpout.name: Wimp Out
wimpout.desc: When this Pokemon has more than 1/2 its maximum HP and takes damage bringing it to 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, it immediately switches out to a chosen ally. This effect applies after all hits from a multi-hit move. This effect is prevented if the move had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability. This effect applies to both direct and indirect damage, except Curse and Substitute on use, Belly Drum, Pain Split, and confusion damage.
wimpout.shortDesc: This Pokemon switches out when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP.

windpower.name: Wind Power
windpower.desc: This Pokemon gains the Charge effect when it takes a hit from a wind move or when Tailwind begins on this Pokemon's side.
windpower.shortDesc: This Pokemon gains the Charge effect when hit by a wind move or Tailwind begins.

windrider.name: Wind Rider
windrider.desc: This Pokemon is immune to wind moves and raises its Attack by 1 stage when hit by a wind move or when Tailwind begins on this Pokemon's side.
windrider.shortDesc: Attack raised by 1 if hit by a wind move or Tailwind begins. Wind move immunity.

wonderguard.name: Wonder Guard
wonderguard.desc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.
wonderguard.shortDesc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.

wonderskin.name: Wonder Skin
wonderskin.desc: Non-damaging moves that check accuracy have their accuracy changed to 50% when used against this Pokemon. This effect comes before other effects that modify accuracy.
wonderskin.shortDesc: Status moves with accuracy checks are 50% accurate when used on this Pokemon.

zenmode.name: Zen Mode
zenmode.desc: If this Pokemon is a Darmanitan or Galarian Darmanitan, it changes to Zen Mode if it has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP at the end of a turn. If Darmanitan's HP is above 1/2 of its maximum HP at the end of a turn, it changes back to Standard Mode.
zenmode.shortDesc: If Darmanitan, at end of turn changes Mode to Standard if > 1/2 max HP, else Zen.

zerotohero.name: Zero to Hero
zerotohero.desc: If this Pokemon is a Palafin in Zero Form, switching out has it change to Hero Form.
zerotohero.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is a Palafin in Zero Form, switching out has it change to Hero Form.

mountaineer.name: Mountaineer
mountaineer.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon avoids all Rock-type attacks and Stealth Rock.
mountaineer.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon avoids all Rock-type attacks and Stealth Rock.

rebound.name: Rebound
rebound.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon blocks certain status moves and instead uses the move against the original user.
rebound.shortDesc: On switch-in, blocks certain status moves and bounces them back to the user.

persistent.name: Persistent
persistent.desc: The duration of Gravity, Heal Block, Magic Room, Safeguard, Tailwind, Trick Room, and Wonder Room is increased by 2 turns if the effect is started by this Pokemon.
persistent.shortDesc: When used, Gravity/Heal Block/Safeguard/Tailwind/Room effects last 2 more turns.

adminabuse.name: Admin Abuse
adminabuse.desc: This Pokemon's hammer-based attacks have 1.2x power and have their negative effects removed.
adminabuse.shortDesc: This Pokemon's hammer-based attacks have 1.2x power and have their negative effects removed.

anyability.name: Any Ability
anyability.desc: It's any ability. Becomes a random ability available in Clover on switch-in.
anyability.shortDesc: It's any ability. Becomes a random ability available in Clover on switch-in.

blademaster.name: Blademaster
blademaster.desc: This Pokemon's sword- or cutting-based attacks have 1.2x power and have +1 crit ratio.
blademaster.shortDesc: This Pokemon's sword- or cutting-based attacks have 1.2x power and have +1 crit ratio.

boombox.name: Boombox
boombox.desc: This Pokemon's sound-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2 and takes 1/2 damage from sound attacks.
boombox.shortDesc: This Pokemon's sound-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.2 and takes 1/2 damage from sound attacks.

bonezone.name: Bone Zone
bonezone.desc: This Pokemon's Bone-based moves ignore immunities and abilities.
bonezone.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Bone-based moves ignore immunities and abilities.

concert.name: Concert
concert.desc: All Pokemon on the field lose 1/16 HP per turn if they're not immune to sound effects.
concert.shortDesc: All Pokemon on the field lose 1/16 HP per turn if they're not immune to sound effects.

degenerate.name: Degenerate
degenerate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Dark-type moves and have their power multiplied by 1.2. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.
degenerate.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Dark type and have 1.2x power.

degradation.name: Degradation
degradation.desc: This Pokemon's Dark-type attacks are super-effective against Normal- and Fairy-types.
degradation.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Dark-type attacks are super-effective against Normal- and Fairy-types.

flareheal.name: Flare Heal
flareheal.desc: If this Pokemon is burned, it restores 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn instead of losing HP; burn's physical damage halving is ignored.
flareheal.shortDesc: This Pokemon is healed by 1/8 of its max HP each turn when burned; no HP loss or reduction to the power of its physical moves.

ghostnote.name: Ghost Note
ghostnote.desc: This Pokemon's sound-based moves become Ghost-type moves. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.
ghostnote.shortDesc: This Pokemon's sound-based moves become Ghost type.

gradient.name: Gradient
gradient.desc: Changes type in battle based on the foe's color. Biteki always has STAB with Ice and Psychic moves. Red = Fire, Blue = Water, Yellow = Electric, Green = Grass, Black = Dark, Brown = Ground, Purple = Poison, Gray = Steel, White = Flying, Pink = Fairy.
gradient.shortDesc: Changes type in battle based on the foe's color. Biteki always has STAB with Ice and Psychic moves, Blobbos-Fool's always has STAB with Dark and ??? moves and Blobbos-Artist always has STAB with Normal and ??? moves.

hydrophile.name: Hydrophile
hydrophile.desc: This Pokemon's attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Water-type attack. This Pokemon is healed 1/4 by Water, 1/8 by Rain.
hydrophile.shortDesc: This Pokemon's attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Water-type attack. This Pokemon is healed 1/4 by Water, 1/8 by Rain.

jewelry.name: Jewelry
jewelry.desc: If this Pokemon has no item, it finds a gem matching the type of one of its moves, prioritizing attacking moves, at the end of this turn.
jewelry.shortDesc: If this Pokemon has no item, it finds a gem matching the type of one of its moves at the end of this turn.

madman.name: Madman
madman.desc: This Pokemon's contact moves have a 100% chance of confusing.

moreroom.name: More Room
moreroom.desc: The duration of Inverse Room, Magic Room, Trick Room, and Wonder Room is increased by 2 turns if the effect is started by this Pokemon.
moreroom.shortDesc: When used, Room effects last 2 more turns.

pollution.name: Pollution
pollution.desc: This Pokemon's Poison-type attacks are super-effective against Water-, Flying- and Ground-types.
pollution.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Poison-type attacks are super-effective against Water-, Flying- and Ground-types.

pozzed.name: Pozzed
pozzed.desc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Poison moves; Poison immunity. Toxic Orb, Toxic Spikes, etc. and non-Poison-type moves can still Poison this Pokemon. No HP loss from Poison. This Pokemon's attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Poison-type attack. Absorbs Toxic Spikes.
pozzed.shortDesc: This Pokemon is immune to Poison-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Poison-type move. No HP loss from Poison. This Pokemon's attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Poison-type attack. Absorbs Toxic Spikes.

puppeteer.name: Puppeteer
puppeteer.desc: This Pokemon's attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Bug-type attack.
puppeteer.shortDesc: This Pokemon's attacking stat is multiplied by 1.5 while using a Bug-type attack.

showerpower.name: Shower Power
showerpower.desc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Special Attack is multiplied by 1.5 and it loses 1/8 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If this Pokemon is holding Utility Umbrella, its Special Attack remains the same and it does not lose any HP.
showerpower.shortDesc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x; loses 1/8 max HP per turn.

striker.name: Striker
striker.desc: This Pokemon's kick-based attacks have 1.2x power and always hit.
striker.shortDesc: This Pokemon's kick-based attacks have 1.2x power and always hit.

suddenly.name: Suddenly

suddenly.shortDesc: This Pokemon's two-turn moves complete in one turn (except Sky Drop).

woke.name: Woke

woke.shortDesc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability changed to Woke.

woodenguard.name: Wooden Guard

woodenguard.shortDesc: This Pokemon recieves 1.5x damage from Fire moves, 0.75x from other moves.

jihad.name: Jihad

jihad.shortDesc: +1 priority to suicide moves. Immune to sandstorm.

phantasma.shortDesc: 1.5x boost to Ghost-type moves. Immune to trapping. Curse is Ghost-type.

shitstorm.shortDesc: Starts Mud Sport and Water Sport on switch-in.

fuku.shortDesc: Sets all other mons to Normal-type on switch-in.

stinkbomb.shortDesc: Sets all mons abilities to Stench. Makes all attacks Poison-type for 1 turn.

whiteflames.name: White Flames

whiteflames.shortDesc: 1.2x damage against inferior mons. Takes 0.5x damage from inferior mons.

boardpowerc.shortDesc: Adds Fairy-type. Fairy Aura. Gender-neutral Cute Charm. Attract works on any gender.

boardpowerfit.shortDesc: Adds Fighting-type. Uses Hulk Up on switch-in.

boardpowerg.shortDesc: Adds Electric-type. Sets Electric Terrain and uses Charge on switch-in.

boardpowerh.shortDesc: Adds Fire-type. Gender-neutral Cute Charm. Attract works on any gender. 1/3 chance to attract on hit.

boardpowerint.shortDesc: Adaptability. Sets Psychic Terrain on switch-in.

boardpowerjp.shortDesc: Adds Fairy-type. Serene Grace. Treated as female.

boardpowerk.shortDesc: Adds Steel-type. Bulletproof. +1 Def and +SpD on switch-in.

boardpowerout.shortDesc: Sets Grassy Terrain on switch-in. 2x boost to Nature Power moves.

boardpowerpol.shortDesc: Stakeout. Analytic. Psychic-type moves hit Dark-types.

boardpowers4s.shortDesc: +1 priority to status moves. Immune to Prankster.

boardpowersoc.shortDesc: Frisk. Friend Guard. Poison Absorb (like Water Absorb). Poison-type moves have 1.5x power.

boardpowertv.shortDesc: Adds Ground-type. Sets Gravity on switch-in.

boardpowervg.shortDesc: Adds Dragon-type. Repeated attacks get 20% BP boosted up to 160 BP.

boardpowervp.shortDesc: Poison Heal. Puppeteer. Bug Absorb (like Water Absorb).

boardpowervr.shortDesc: Sets Magic Room and suppresses all other abilities other than Comatose and Board Power on switch-in.

boardpowerx.name: Board Power (/x/)

boardpowerx.shortDesc: Adds Ghost-type. Turns all other mons into pure Ghost-types.

boardpowerz.name: Board Power (/z/)
boardpowerz.desc: Becomes pure ???-type. Shield Dust. Keen Eye. Comatose. Shell Armor.
boardpowerz.shortDesc: Becomes pure ???-type. Shield Dust. Keen Eye. Comatose. Shell Armor.

presage.shortDesc: Changes weather to benefit certain moves.

cacophony.desc: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, including Heal Bell.
cacophony.shortDesc: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, including Heal Bell.

artificial.name: Artificial
artificial.desc: Long Reach + Shield Dust + Filter + Keen Eye. Immune to status. Can't be crit or flinched. Infinite PP. Ability cannot be altered or suppressed. Immune to Disable, Encore, Taunt, Torment, OHKO moves, Leech Seed, Pain Split, Psycho Shift, Spite, Perish Song, Endeavor, Destiny Bond, Grudge, Trick, Heart Swap, Guard Split, Power Swap, Speed Swap, Power Split, Super Fang, and damage from trapping moves. Cannot be transformed into. +3 Spe when under 1/3 HP.

Immune to Disable, Encore, Taunt, Torment, OHKO moves, Leech Seed, Pain Split, Psycho Shift, Spite, Perish Song, Endeavor, Destiny Bond, Grudge, Trick, Heart Swap, Guard Split, Power Swap, Speed Swap, Power Split, Super Fang, and damage from trapping moves. Cannot be transformed into. +3 Spe when under 1/3 HP.

cakeveil.name: Cake Veil

rusepower.name: Ruse Power

omniscience.name: Omniscience

spookyaura.name: Spooky Aura

spookyaura.shortDesc: While this Pokemon is active, a Ghost move used by any Pokemon has 1.33x power.

tetanus.name: Tetanus

colonoscopy.name: Colonoscopy

blueblood.name: Blue Blood

blueblood.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 12 stages after it is damaged by a Dark-type move.

shavedice.name: Shaved Ice

temperamental.name: Temperamental

temperamental.shortDesc: If Disbeary, it changes between Nice and Ebil Mode at the end of each turn.

beamboost.name: Beam Boost
beamboost.desc: This Pokemon's Beam-based attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.
beamboost.shortDesc: This Pokemon's beam attacks have 1.5x power.

detonator.name: Detonator
detonator.desc: Bomb attacks have 1.2x power and doubled secondary effect chances.
detonator.shortDesc: Bomb attacks have 1.2x power and doubled secondary effect chances.

horror.name: Horror
horror.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage at the end of each full turn on the field. On switch-in, adds Grass to the all foe's type(s).

overeager.name: Overeager

overeager.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves hit thrice. Hits after the first have their damage quartered.

overeagerest.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves hit 100 times. Hits after the first increase in damage exponentially.

swarming.name: Swarming
swarming.desc: On switch-in, if this Pokemon is a Jermin that is level 20 or above and has more than 1/4 of its maximum HP left, it changes to Swarm Form. If it is in Swarm Form and its HP drops to 1/4 of its maximum HP or less, it changes to Solo Form at the end of the turn. If it is in Solo Form and its HP is greater than 1/4 its maximum HP at the end of the turn, it changes to Swarm Form.
swarming.shortDesc: If user is Jermin, changes to Swarm Form if it has > 1/4 max HP, else Solo Form.

stoneflesh.name: Stoneflesh
stoneflesh.desc: If this Pokemon is an Gargarramer, it changes to Awoken Forme before attempting to use an attacking move, and changes to Statue Forme before attempting to use Petrify.
stoneflesh.shortDesc: If Gargarramer, changes Forme to Awoken before attacks and Statue before Petrify.

sousaphone.name: Sousaphone
sousaphone.desc: This Pokemon's sound-based moves become Steel-type moves. This effect comes after other effects that change a move's type, but before Ion Deluge and Electrify's effects.
sousaphone.shortDesc: This Pokemon's sound-based moves become Steel type.

spincleaner.name: Spin Cleaner
spincleaner.desc: When this Pokemon switches in, entry hazards on this side are removed.
spincleaner.shortDesc: When this Pokemon switches in, entry hazards on this side are removed.

kinglymajesty.name: Kingly Majesty

kinglymajesty.shortDesc: This Pokemon and its allies are protected from opposing negative priority moves.

shitbugtactics.name: Shitbug Tactics

shitbugtactics.shortDesc: This Pokemon's SpA is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.

brainpower.name: Brain Power

brainpower.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Special Attack is doubled.

dispenser.shortDesc: At the end of every turn, heals user and allies for 1/16 of their max HP and recycles the user's item, unless it's a berry.

bonerzoner.name: Boner Zoner

eclipse.name: Eclipse

pairoswrath.name: Pairo's Wrath

slavemaster.name: Slavemaster

slavemaster.shortDesc: Doubles the power of HM moves.

chording.name: Chording

radishbody.name: Radish Body
radishbody.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be radished.
radishbody.shortDesc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be radished.

lootable.name: Lootable

sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter

sharpshooter.shortDesc: This Pokemon's critical hits deal 1.5x damage; +1 Crit ratio.

blobbotype.name: Blobbotype

frozenbunker.name: Frozen Bunker

boundary.name: Boundary

boundary.shortDesc: This Pokemon's attacks that are super effective against the target do 1.5x damage.

niceface.name: Nice Face

Blobbos-Nice regains its Leaf Shield forme when Grassy Terrain begins or when Eiscue switches in while Grassy Terrain is active. Confusion damage also breaks the leaf shield.
niceface.shortDesc: If Blobbos-Nice, the first physical hit it takes deals 0 damage. This effect is restored in Grassy Terrain.
